name: Rat Souls Pre-Release Testing
description:
Hello! This was my High School Final that is now a Passion Project that I, knowing myself,  might abandon at any moment. For now it is at it's pre-release stages and I decided to open it to public testing. 

Currently there is no sound nor graphics however I plan to add some. It is a text based combat game that as of the moment has all of the lore inaccessible, however on it's final release it will have lore and a slight story to follow.

The game currently has 2 floors with 2 bosses, out of 10 floors with 10+ bosses.

Here are the things I am looking for the most in the testing:

  1. bugs
  2. scaling issues(Enemies becoming easier or potentially too hard/impossible)
  3. ideas, email me any ideas you may have at RatSouls@gmail.com
  4. Just any general things that interest you and potential players.

Thanks for reading this far! For special ester egg, review game and contact me at RatSouls@gmail.com
